frame.name: Representative
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Representative</fen> is authorized by a <fen>Represented</fen> to communicate on behalf of the <fen>Represented</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Representative">She</fex> is a <t>representative</t> <fex name="Representative">for Pepsi</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Representative</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Representative</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Representative</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Representative</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Representative</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition: <def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Representative</fen> is associated. </def-root>

FE.name: Rank
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Rank</fen> is the position in a hierarchy that a <fen>Representative</fen> occupies within an organization.</def-root>

FE.name: Place_of_employment
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the Place where the <fen>Representative</fen> works.</def-root>

FE.name: Represented
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Represented</fen> authorizes the <fen>Representative</fen> to communicate on its behalf.</def-root>

FE.name: Compensation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Representative</fen> receives for performing a task.</def-root>

FE.name: Contract_basis
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Contract_basis</fen> describes the conditions of employment with respect to permanency, hours per time period, or payment basis.
<ex>Smithers is a <fex name="cb">half-time</fex> <t>spokesperson</t> for Procteur et Gamble </ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: representative.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: One who acts on another's behalf or on the behalfof a group of people.

lexUnit.name: spokesperson.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person who advocates for and speaks on behalf of another or an organization
